p: Our results should be interpreted with caution due to the lack of information about the time of infection, risk of transmission, country of origin and limited representativeness for the North region of Portugal [ 2]. The BEST-HOPE project is prospectively collecting recent socio-demographic and behavioral data to complete the picture of the current patterns of transmission in the country [ 33]. Finally, phylogenetic analyses have intrinsic limitations since it does not provide information about sexual networks and depends on the sampling density [ 34].
